anuradhapura nagara simawa thula pihiti mahajana wasikili bhawitha karana mahajanathawata wasikili bhawitha kirima sandaha rupiyal 20ka mudalak gewimata sidu wima hethuwen owun dadi lesa apahasuthawayata pathwa sitithi.anuradhapura nagaraye sathosa aasannaye pihiti podu wasikiliyath podu welada pole (makart) pihiti wasikiliyath anuradhapura parani nagaraye pihiti podu wasikiliyeth ek ayekuth ek wathawakata rupiyal 20ka wani wishala mudalak laba ganna bawa ema wasikili bhawitha karannan penwa dethi.me hethuwen wishala washayen apahasuthawayata pathwa aththe wyapara wala niratha wana pudgalayanya.wasikili yama sandaha rupiyal 10ka mudalak ayakarana bawa pradarshanaya kara thibunath wasikili gos in pitathata pamineddi wasikili bhawithaya sandaha rupiyal 20ka mudalak wasikili bharakaru illa sitina bawada owun pawasathi.anuradhapura maha nagara sabhawen tendar yatathe wiwidha pudgalayan me wasikili baddhata labagena athi athara maha nagara sabhawe nithiyata anuwa wasikili bhawitha karanneku gewiya yuthu uparima mudala rupiyal 10k wana athara itha honda saniparakshaka thaththwayen wasikili thibiya yuthu bawatada nithi sampadanaya kara atha.eheth me wasikiliwala pirisidubhawaya itha pahath mattamaka pawathina athara eewa bharawa sitinnanda adhika lesa bimathwa sewaya karana bawath rupiyal 20ka mudalak nodunahoth wasikiliyen pitawa yametawath ida nodena bawa wasikili bhawitha karannan pawasathi.aganuwara bohomayak wasikili itha pirisidu thaththwayen thibena athara ema wasikiliyakata yamata rupiyal 10 ka mudalak aya karana bawa janathawa penwa dunha.
